Package playn.core

Class Scale

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.Scale

  • public class Scale
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a scale factor, provides useful utility methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getScaledResources

        public java.util.List<Scale.ScaledResource> getScaledResources​(java.lang.String path)
        Returns an ordered series of scaled resources to try when loading an asset. The highest (presumably native) resolution will be tried first, then that will be stepped down to all whole integers less than the native resolution. Often this is simply 2, 1, but on a Retina iPad, it could be 4, 3, 2, 1, and on Android devices it may often be something like 3, 2, 1 or 2.5, 2, 1.
